attr.title: Splinter Zone
attr.desc: Run, jump, and shoot everything that stands in your way. Then die and try again. Maybe a bit wiser about what lies ahead. Maybe with an escape plan. Maybe not.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://mokka.itch.io/splinter-zone) or Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/612160/Splinter_Zone), download and copy the files to the port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [itch.io](https://mokka.itch.io/splinter-zone) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/612160/Splinter_Zone), download and copy the files to the port's *gamedata* folder.
